item.title: Need Help Changing Animations Emote's Text
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Add this to packet 185 and then click the button to find the ID…

		if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yournamehere")){
		println("Button = " + actionButtonId);
		}

item.title: Need Help Changing Animations Emote's Text
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Kyler445, post:3, topic:291952”][quote author=Kuchiki link=topic=385772.msg2892345#msg2892345 date=1248979611]
Useless poll.

sendQuest("blah blah text here!", ID);

Replace “blah blah text here!” with your text. Replace “ID” with the ID.
[/quote]

WHAT I Mean IS I Wanna Change Yes TO Home And MakeIt Teleport To MY hOME[/quote]

THAT is WHat I mean.

It changes “yes” to whatever the hell you want.

As for the teleport.

case ####:
teleportToX($$$$);
teleportToY(%%%%);
break;

Replace “####” with the ID…"$$$$" with the x coord…"%%%%" with the Y coord…

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Changing Animations Emote's Text
